description: AI domain provides an AI risk score given a domain url.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

LLMProviders.title: LLMProviders

LLMProvidersRisk.description: Overall risk assessment for the LLM providers.
LLMProvidersRisk.title: LLMProvidersRisk

compliances.description: Certifications or Security Frameworks implemented by the provider.
compliances.title: compliances

compliancesRisk.description: Overall risk assessment for the compliences.
compliancesRisk.title: compliancesRisk

dataPolicies.description: List of policies defining how the provider will use customer data.
dataPolicies.title: dataPolicies

dataPoliciesRisk.description: Overall risk assessment for the data policies.
dataPoliciesRisk.title: dataPoliciesRisk

dataProcessors.description: List of data processors used the provider.
dataProcessors.title: dataProcessors

dataProcessorsRisk.description: Overall risk assessment for the data processors.
dataProcessorsRisk.title: dataProcessorsRisk

description.description: A brief description about the AI domain and what services it provides.
description.title: description

features.description: The features implemented by the provider.
features.title: features

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.
importHash.title: importHash

importLabel.description: The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the same import operation.
importLabel.title: importLabel

industry.description: The AI Categories of the services.
industry.title: industry

name.description: The name of the ai domain.
name.title: name

plans.description: List of plans/tiers offered by the provider.
plans.title: plans

propagate.description: Propagates the object to all child namespaces. This is always true.
propagate.title: propagate

providerName.description: The name of the main provider.
providerName.title: providerName

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
updateTime.title: updateTime
